about_the_game:
The Dungeon Drafters Soundtrack is a gem crafted with passion, offering a chiptune-style sound that perfectly captures the essence of the game.

The music strikes a perfect balance with combat and exploration tracks, creating a thrilling and upbeat atmosphere throughout. With 76 tracks spread over two discs, the album is a testament to the talented composers who created it.

Whether you're a hardcore gamer or simply love great music, this soundtrack is sure to impress with its masterful sound and immersive experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 442 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Includes .mp3, .wav, and .flac formats.

short_description: Dungeon Drafters Official Soundtrack features 76 tracks from the game, thrilling and upbeat atmosphere that perfectly captures the essence of the game.
